definition[0]: when money, goods etc leave a bank, country etc
example[0]: the outflow of capital from the developed countries
definition[1]: the flow of water or air from something
example[2]: an outflow of gas escaping from the main duct
definition[2]: money which is being taken out of a company, country etc
example[3]: The insurance company paid over $1.33 billion to policyholders, creating a vast cash outflow.
